verses.verse: Now when the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> delayed <S%H954><s%> to come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> about <S%H5921><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Come, <S%H6965><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> us a god <S%H430><s%> who <S%H834><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us; as for this <S%H2088><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> brought <S%H5927><s%> us up from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> we do not know <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> has become <S%H1961><s%> of him."

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Tear <S%H6561><s%> off <S%H6561><s%> the gold <S%H2091><s%> rings <S%H5141><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are in the ears <S%H241><s%> of your wives, <S%H802><s%> your sons, <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> [them] to me."

Then all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> tore <S%H6561><s%> off <S%H6561><s%> the gold <S%H2091><s%> rings <S%H5141><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were in their ears, <S%H241><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> [them] to Aaron. <S%H175><s%>

And he took <S%H3947><s%> [this <S%H428><s%>] from their hand, <S%H3027><s%> and fashioned <S%H9476><s%> it with a graving <S%H2747><s%> tool, <S%H2747><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> it into a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf; <S%H5695><s%> and they said, <S%H559><s%> "This is your god, <S%H430><s%> O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H834><s%> brought <S%H5927><s%> you up from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>"

Now when Aaron <S%H175><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> [this,] he built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> it; and Aaron <S%H175><s%> made <S%H7121><s%> a proclamation <S%H7121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> [shall be] a feast <S%H2282><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

So the next <S%H4283><s%> day <S%H4283><s%> they rose <S%H7965><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings, <S%H5930><s%> and brought <S%H5066><s%> peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings; <S%H8002><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> down <S%H3427><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> and to drink, <S%H8354><s%> and rose <S%H6925><s%> up to play. <S%H6711><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Go <S%H1980><s%> down <S%H1980><s%> <S%H3381><s%> at once, <S%H3381><s%> for your people, <S%H5971><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you brought <S%H5927><s%> up from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> have corrupted <S%H7843><s%> [themselves.]

"They have quickly <S%H4118><s%> turned <S%H5493><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> them. They have made <S%H6213><s%> for themselves a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf, <S%H5695><s%> and have worshiped <S%H7812><s%> it, and have sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> to it, and said, <S%H559><s%> 'This <S%H428><s%> is your god, <S%H430><s%> O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H834><s%> brought <S%H5927><s%> you up from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt! <S%H4714><s%>'"

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "I have seen <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> they are an obstinate <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>

"Now <S%H6258><s%> then let <S%H5117><s%> Me alone, <S%H5117><s%> that My anger <S%H639><s%> may burn <S%H2734><s%> against them, and that I may destroy <S%H3615><s%> them; and I will make <S%H6213><s%> of you a great <S%H1419><s%> nation. <S%H1471><s%>"

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> entreated <S%H9134><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> his God, <S%H430><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> doth Thine anger <S%H639><s%> burn <S%H2734><s%> against Thy people <S%H5971><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Thou hast brought <S%H3318><s%> out from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%> and with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>?

"Why <S%H4100><s%> should the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> speak, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'With evil <S%H9567><s%> [intent] He brought <S%H3318><s%> them out to kill <S%H2026><s%> them in the mountains <S%H2022><s%> and to destroy <S%H3615><s%> them from the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>'? Turn <S%H7725><s%> from Thy burning <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> and change <S%H5162><s%> Thy mind <S%H5162><s%> about <S%H5921><s%> [doing] harm <S%H9567><s%> to Thy people. <S%H5971><s%>

"Remember <S%H2142><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Thy servants <S%H5650><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> Thou didst swear <S%H7650><s%> by Thyself, and didst say <S%H1696><s%> to them, 'I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> your descendants <S%H2233><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> land <S%H776><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> I have spoken <S%H559><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> to your descendants, <S%H2233><s%> and they shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> [it] forever. <S%H5769><s%>'"

So the Lord <S%H3068><s%> changed <S%H5162><s%> His mind <S%H5162><s%> about <S%H5921><s%> the harm <S%H9567><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He said <S%H1696><s%> He would do <S%H6213><s%> to His people. <S%H5971><s%>

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> turned <S%H6437><s%> and went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain <S%H2022><s%> with the two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> which were written <S%H3789><s%> on both <S%H8147><s%> sides; <S%H5676><s%> they were written <S%H3789><s%> on one <S%H2088><s%> [side] and the other. <S%H2088><s%>
And the tablets <S%H3871><s%> were God's work, <S%H4639><s%> and the writing <S%H4385><s%> was God's writing <S%H4385><s%> engraved <S%H2801><s%> on the tablets. <S%H3871><s%>

Now when Joshua <S%H3091><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> as they shouted, <S%H7452><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "There is a sound <S%H6963><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> in the camp. <S%H4264><s%>"

But he said, <S%H559><s%> "It is not the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the cry <S%H9420><s%> of triumph, <S%H1369><s%> Nor <S%H369><s%> is it the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the cry <S%H9420><s%> of defeat; <S%H2476><s%> But the sound <S%H6963><s%> of singing <S%H9420><s%> I hear. <S%H8085><s%>"

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about, as soon <S%H9201><s%> as Moses came <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> that he saw <S%H7200><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%> and [the] dancing; <S%H4246><s%> and Moses' anger <S%H639><s%> burned, <S%H2734><s%> and he threw <S%H7993><s%> the tablets <S%H3871><s%> from his hands <S%H3027><s%> and shattered <S%H7665><s%> them at the foot <S%H8478><s%> of the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

And he took <S%H3947><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had made <S%H6213><s%> and burned <S%H8313><s%> [it] with fire, <S%H784><s%> and ground <S%H2912><s%> it to powder, <S%H834><s%> <S%H1854><s%> and scattered <S%H2219><s%> it over <S%H5921><s%> the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the water, <S%H4325><s%> and made the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> [it.]

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> did this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to you, that you have brought <S%H935><s%> [such] great <S%H1419><s%> sin <S%H2401><s%> upon them?"

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Do not let the anger <S%H639><s%> of my lord <S%H113><s%> burn; <S%H2734><s%> you know <S%H3045><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> yourself, <S%H859><s%> that they are prone to evil. <S%H9563><s%>

"For they said <S%H559><s%> to me, 'Make <S%H6213><s%> a god <S%H430><s%> for us who <S%H834><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us; for this <S%H2088><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> brought <S%H5927><s%> us up from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> we do not know <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> has become <S%H1961><s%> of him.'

"And I said <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Whoever <S%H4310><s%> has any gold, <S%H2091><s%> let them tear <S%H6561><s%> it off. <S%H6561><s%>' So they gave <S%H5414><s%> [it] to me, and I threw <S%H7993><s%> it into the fire, <S%H784><s%> and out came <S%H3318><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> calf. <S%H5695><s%>"

Now when Moses <S%H4872><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> were out of control <S%H6544><s%> – for Aaron <S%H175><s%> had let them get <S%H6544><s%> out of control <S%H6544><s%> to be a derision <S%H8103><s%> among their enemies <S%H6965><s%> –

then Moses <S%H4872><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Whoever <S%H4310><s%> is for the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> [come] to me!" And all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> together to him.

And he said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H1696><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'Every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> [of you] put <S%H7760><s%> his sword <S%H2719><s%> upon his thigh, <S%H3409><s%> and go <S%H5674><s%> <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> and forth <S%H5674><s%> from gate <S%H8179><s%> to gate <S%H8179><s%> in the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and kill <S%H2026><s%> every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> and every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> his friend, <S%H7453><s%> and every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> his neighbor. <S%H7453><s%>'"

So the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> instructed, <S%H1697><s%> and about three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> that day. <S%H3117><s%>

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Dedicate <S%H4390><s%> yourselves <S%H3027><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> – for every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> has been against his son <S%H1121><s%> and against his brother <S%H251><s%> – in order that He may bestow <S%H5414><s%> a blessing <S%H1293><s%> upon you today. <S%H3117><s%>"

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about on the next <S%H4283><s%> day <S%H4283><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "You yourselves <S%H9043><s%> have committed <S%H2398><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> sin; <S%H2401><s%> and now <S%H6258><s%> I am going <S%H5927><s%> up to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> perhaps <S%H194><s%> I can make <S%H3722><s%> atonement <S%H3722><s%> for your sin. <S%H9128><s%>"

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Alas, <S%H577><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> has committed <S%H2398><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> sin, <S%H2401><s%> and they have made <S%H6213><s%> a god <S%H430><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for themselves.

"But now, <S%H6258><s%> if <S%H518><s%> Thou wilt, forgive <S%H5375><s%> their sin <S%H9128><s%> – and if <S%H518><s%> not, please <S%H4994><s%> blot <S%H4229><s%> me out from Thy book <S%H5612><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Thou hast written! <S%H3789><s%>"

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Whoever <S%H4310><s%> <S%H834><s%> has sinned <S%H2398><s%> against Me, I will blot <S%H4229><s%> him out of My book. <S%H5612><s%>

"But go <S%H1980><s%> now, <S%H6258><s%> lead <S%H5148><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> where <S%H413><s%> <S%H834><s%> I told <S%H1696><s%> you. Behold, <S%H2009><s%> My angel <S%H4397><s%> shall go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; nevertheless in the day <S%H3117><s%> when I punish, <S%H6485><s%> I will punish <S%H6485><s%> them for their sin. <S%H9128><s%>"

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> smote <S%H5062><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834><s%> of what <S%H834><s%> they did <S%H6213><s%> with the calf <S%H5695><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> had made. <S%H6213><s%>
